name: Bubble Buster
overview: The player tries to catch bubbles falling form the top of the screen with a series of 5 buckets. The buckets move horizontally at the bottom of the screen. As bubbles fall from the top, they disappear off the screen. If the player misses a bubble, they lose a bucket. All buckets lost, and it's game over. When all bubbles drop, a new series of bubbles appear at the top of the screen.
